53/**
54 * SECTION:hb-ot-font
55 * @title: hb-ot-font
56 * @short_description: OpenType font implementation
57 * @include: hb-ot.h
58 *
59 * Functions for using OpenType fonts with hb_shape(). Note that fonts returned
60 * by hb_font_create() default to using these functions, so most clients would
61 * never need to call these functions directly.
62 **/
63
64using hb_ot_font_cmap_cache_t = hb_cache_t<21, 16, 8, true>;
65using hb_ot_font_advance_cache_t = hb_cache_t<24, 16, 8, true>;
66
67static hb_user_data_key_t hb_ot_font_cmap_cache_user_data_key;
68
69struct hb_ot_font_t
70{
71 const hb_ot_face_t *ot_face;
72
73 hb_ot_font_cmap_cache_t *cmap_cache;
74
75 /* h_advance caching */
76 mutable hb_atomic_int_t cached_coords_serial;
77 mutable hb_atomic_ptr_t<hb_ot_font_advance_cache_t> advance_cache;
78};
79
80static hb_ot_font_t *
81_hb_ot_font_create (hb_font_t *font)
82{
83 hb_ot_font_t *ot_font = (hb_ot_font_t *) hb_calloc (nmemb: 1, size: sizeof (hb_ot_font_t));
84 if (unlikely (!ot_font))
85 return nullptr;
86
87 ot_font->ot_face = &font->face->table;
88
89 // retry:
90 auto *cmap_cache = (hb_ot_font_cmap_cache_t *) hb_face_get_user_data (face: font->face,
91 key: &hb_ot_font_cmap_cache_user_data_key);
92 if (!cmap_cache)
93 {
94 cmap_cache = (hb_ot_font_cmap_cache_t *) hb_malloc (size: sizeof (hb_ot_font_cmap_cache_t));
95 if (unlikely (!cmap_cache)) goto out;
96 cmap_cache->init ();
97 if (unlikely (!hb_face_set_user_data (font->face,
98 &hb_ot_font_cmap_cache_user_data_key,
99 cmap_cache,
100 hb_free,
101 false)))
102 {
103 hb_free (ptr: cmap_cache);
104 cmap_cache = nullptr;
105 /* Normally we would retry here, but that would
106 * infinite-loop if the face is the empty-face.
107 * Just let it go and this font will be uncached if it
108 * happened to collide with another thread creating the
109 * cache at the same time. */
110 // goto retry;
111 }
112 }
113 out:
114 ot_font->cmap_cache = cmap_cache;
115
116 return ot_font;
117}
118
119static void
120_hb_ot_font_destroy (void *font_data)
121{
122 hb_ot_font_t *ot_font = (hb_ot_font_t *) font_data;
123
124 auto *cache = ot_font->advance_cache.get_relaxed ();
125 hb_free (ptr: cache);
126
127 hb_free (ptr: ot_font);
128}
129
130static hb_bool_t
131hb_ot_get_nominal_glyph (hb_font_t *font HB_UNUSED,
132 void *font_data,
133 hb_codepoint_t unicode,
134 hb_codepoint_t *glyph,
135 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
136{
137 const hb_ot_font_t *ot_font = (const hb_ot_font_t *) font_data;
138 const hb_ot_face_t *ot_face = ot_font->ot_face;
139 return ot_face->cmap->get_nominal_glyph (unicode, glyph, cache: ot_font->cmap_cache);
140}
141
142static unsigned int
143hb_ot_get_nominal_glyphs (hb_font_t *font HB_UNUSED,
144 void *font_data,
145 unsigned int count,
146 const hb_codepoint_t *first_unicode,
147 unsigned int unicode_stride,
148 hb_codepoint_t *first_glyph,
149 unsigned int glyph_stride,
150 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
151{
152 const hb_ot_font_t *ot_font = (const hb_ot_font_t *) font_data;
153 const hb_ot_face_t *ot_face = ot_font->ot_face;
154 return ot_face->cmap->get_nominal_glyphs (count,
155 first_unicode, unicode_stride,
156 first_glyph, glyph_stride,
157 cache: ot_font->cmap_cache);
158}
159
160static hb_bool_t
161hb_ot_get_variation_glyph (hb_font_t *font HB_UNUSED,
162 void *font_data,
163 hb_codepoint_t unicode,
164 hb_codepoint_t variation_selector,
165 hb_codepoint_t *glyph,
166 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
167{
168 const hb_ot_font_t *ot_font = (const hb_ot_font_t *) font_data;
169 const hb_ot_face_t *ot_face = ot_font->ot_face;
170 return ot_face->cmap->get_variation_glyph (unicode,
171 variation_selector, glyph,
172 cache: ot_font->cmap_cache);
173}
174
175static void
176hb_ot_get_glyph_h_advances (hb_font_t* font, void* font_data,
177 unsigned count,
178 const hb_codepoint_t *first_glyph,
179 unsigned glyph_stride,
180 hb_position_t *first_advance,
181 unsigned advance_stride,
182 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
183{
184
185 const hb_ot_font_t *ot_font = (const hb_ot_font_t *) font_data;
186 const hb_ot_face_t *ot_face = ot_font->ot_face;
187 const OT::hmtx_accelerator_t &hmtx = *ot_face->hmtx;
188
189 hb_position_t *orig_first_advance = first_advance;
190
191#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
192 const OT::HVAR &HVAR = *hmtx.var_table;
193 const OT::VariationStore &varStore = &HVAR + HVAR.varStore;
194 OT::VariationStore::cache_t *varStore_cache = font->num_coords * count >= 128 ? varStore.create_cache () : nullptr;
195
196 bool use_cache = font->num_coords;
197#else
198 OT::VariationStore::cache_t *varStore_cache = nullptr;
199 bool use_cache = false;
200#endif
201
202 hb_ot_font_advance_cache_t *cache = nullptr;
203 if (use_cache)
204 {
205 retry:
206 cache = ot_font->advance_cache.get_acquire ();
207 if (unlikely (!cache))
208 {
209 cache = (hb_ot_font_advance_cache_t *) hb_malloc (size: sizeof (hb_ot_font_advance_cache_t));
210 if (unlikely (!cache))
211 {
212 use_cache = false;
213 goto out;
214 }
215
216 cache->init ();
217 if (unlikely (!ot_font->advance_cache.cmpexch (nullptr, cache)))
218 {
219 hb_free (ptr: cache);
220 goto retry;
221 }
222 ot_font->cached_coords_serial.set_release (font->serial_coords);
223 }
224 }
225 out:
226
227 if (!use_cache)
228 {
229 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < count; i++)
230 {
231 *first_advance = font->em_scale_x (v: hmtx.get_advance_with_var_unscaled (glyph: *first_glyph, font, store_cache: varStore_cache));
232 first_glyph = &StructAtOffsetUnaligned<hb_codepoint_t> (P: first_glyph, offset: glyph_stride);
233 first_advance = &StructAtOffsetUnaligned<hb_position_t> (P: first_advance, offset: advance_stride);
234 }
235 }
236 else
237 { /* Use cache. */
238 if (ot_font->cached_coords_serial.get_acquire () != (int) font->serial_coords)
239 {
240 ot_font->advance_cache->init ();
241 ot_font->cached_coords_serial.set_release (font->serial_coords);
242 }
243
244 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < count; i++)
245 {
246 hb_position_t v;
247 unsigned cv;
248 if (ot_font->advance_cache->get (key: *first_glyph, value: &cv))
249 v = cv;
250 else
251 {
252 v = hmtx.get_advance_with_var_unscaled (glyph: *first_glyph, font, store_cache: varStore_cache);
253 ot_font->advance_cache->set (key: *first_glyph, value: v);
254 }
255 *first_advance = font->em_scale_x (v);
256 first_glyph = &StructAtOffsetUnaligned<hb_codepoint_t> (P: first_glyph, offset: glyph_stride);
257 first_advance = &StructAtOffsetUnaligned<hb_position_t> (P: first_advance, offset: advance_stride);
258 }
259 }
260
261#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
262 OT::VariationStore::destroy_cache (cache: varStore_cache);
263#endif
264
265 if (font->x_strength && !font->embolden_in_place)
266 {
267 /* Emboldening. */
268 hb_position_t x_strength = font->x_scale >= 0 ? font->x_strength : -font->x_strength;
269 first_advance = orig_first_advance;
270 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < count; i++)
271 {
272 *first_advance += *first_advance ? x_strength : 0;
273 first_advance = &StructAtOffsetUnaligned<hb_position_t> (P: first_advance, offset: advance_stride);
274 }
275 }
276}
277
278#ifndef HB_NO_VERTICAL
279static void
280hb_ot_get_glyph_v_advances (hb_font_t* font, void* font_data,
281 unsigned count,
282 const hb_codepoint_t *first_glyph,
283 unsigned glyph_stride,
284 hb_position_t *first_advance,
285 unsigned advance_stride,
286 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
287{
288 const hb_ot_font_t *ot_font = (const hb_ot_font_t *) font_data;
289 const hb_ot_face_t *ot_face = ot_font->ot_face;
290 const OT::vmtx_accelerator_t &vmtx = *ot_face->vmtx;
291
292 hb_position_t *orig_first_advance = first_advance;
293
294 if (vmtx.has_data ())
295 {
296#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
297 const OT::VVAR &VVAR = *vmtx.var_table;
298 const OT::VariationStore &varStore = &VVAR + VVAR.varStore;
299 OT::VariationStore::cache_t *varStore_cache = font->num_coords ? varStore.create_cache () : nullptr;
300#else
301 OT::VariationStore::cache_t *varStore_cache = nullptr;
302#endif
303
304 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < count; i++)
305 {
306 *first_advance = font->em_scale_y (v: -(int) vmtx.get_advance_with_var_unscaled (glyph: *first_glyph, font, store_cache: varStore_cache));
307 first_glyph = &StructAtOffsetUnaligned<hb_codepoint_t> (P: first_glyph, offset: glyph_stride);
308 first_advance = &StructAtOffsetUnaligned<hb_position_t> (P: first_advance, offset: advance_stride);
309 }
310
311#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
312 OT::VariationStore::destroy_cache (cache: varStore_cache);
313#endif
314 }
315 else
316 {
317 hb_font_extents_t font_extents;
318 font->get_h_extents_with_fallback (extents: &font_extents);
319 hb_position_t advance = -(font_extents.ascender - font_extents.descender);
320
321 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < count; i++)
322 {
323 *first_advance = advance;
324 first_glyph = &StructAtOffsetUnaligned<hb_codepoint_t> (P: first_glyph, offset: glyph_stride);
325 first_advance = &StructAtOffsetUnaligned<hb_position_t> (P: first_advance, offset: advance_stride);
326 }
327 }
328
329 if (font->y_strength && !font->embolden_in_place)
330 {
331 /* Emboldening. */
332 hb_position_t y_strength = font->y_scale >= 0 ? font->y_strength : -font->y_strength;
333 first_advance = orig_first_advance;
334 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < count; i++)
335 {
336 *first_advance += *first_advance ? y_strength : 0;
337 first_advance = &StructAtOffsetUnaligned<hb_position_t> (P: first_advance, offset: advance_stride);
338 }
339 }
340}
341#endif
342
343#ifndef HB_NO_VERTICAL
344static hb_bool_t
345hb_ot_get_glyph_v_origin (hb_font_t *font,
346 void *font_data,
347 hb_codepoint_t glyph,
348 hb_position_t *x,
349 hb_position_t *y,
350 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
351{
352 const hb_ot_font_t *ot_font = (const hb_ot_font_t *) font_data;
353 const hb_ot_face_t *ot_face = ot_font->ot_face;
354
355 *x = font->get_glyph_h_advance (glyph) / 2;
356
357 const OT::VORG &VORG = *ot_face->VORG;
358 if (VORG.has_data ())
359 {
360 float delta = 0;
361
362#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
363 const OT::vmtx_accelerator_t &vmtx = *ot_face->vmtx;
364 const OT::VVAR &VVAR = *vmtx.var_table;
365 if (font->num_coords)
366 VVAR.get_vorg_delta_unscaled (glyph,
367 coords: font->coords, coord_count: font->num_coords,
368 delta: &delta);
369#endif
370
371 *y = font->em_scalef_y (v: VORG.get_y_origin (glyph) + delta);
372 return true;
373 }
374
375 hb_glyph_extents_t extents = {.x_bearing: 0};
376 if (ot_face->glyf->get_extents (font, gid: glyph, extents: &extents))
377 {
378 const OT::vmtx_accelerator_t &vmtx = *ot_face->vmtx;
379 int tsb = 0;
380 if (vmtx.get_leading_bearing_with_var_unscaled (font, glyph, lsb: &tsb))
381 {
382 *y = extents.y_bearing + font->em_scale_y (v: tsb);
383 return true;
384 }
385
386 hb_font_extents_t font_extents;
387 font->get_h_extents_with_fallback (extents: &font_extents);
388 hb_position_t advance = font_extents.ascender - font_extents.descender;
389 int diff = advance - -extents.height;
390 *y = extents.y_bearing + (diff >> 1);
391 return true;
392 }
393
394 hb_font_extents_t font_extents;
395 font->get_h_extents_with_fallback (extents: &font_extents);
396 *y = font_extents.ascender;
397
398 return true;
399}
400#endif
401
402static hb_bool_t
403hb_ot_get_glyph_extents (hb_font_t *font,
404 void *font_data,
405 hb_codepoint_t glyph,
406 hb_glyph_extents_t *extents,
407 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
408{
409 const hb_ot_font_t *ot_font = (const hb_ot_font_t *) font_data;
410 const hb_ot_face_t *ot_face = ot_font->ot_face;
411
412#if !defined(HB_NO_OT_FONT_BITMAP) && !defined(HB_NO_COLOR)
413 if (ot_face->sbix->get_extents (font, glyph, extents)) return true;
414 if (ot_face->CBDT->get_extents (font, glyph, extents)) return true;
415#endif
416#if !defined(HB_NO_COLOR)
417 if (ot_face->COLR->get_extents (font, glyph, extents)) return true;
418#endif
419 if (ot_face->glyf->get_extents (font, gid: glyph, extents)) return true;
420#ifndef HB_NO_OT_FONT_CFF
421 if (ot_face->cff1->get_extents (font, glyph, extents)) return true;
422 if (ot_face->cff2->get_extents (font, glyph, extents)) return true;
423#endif
424
425 return false;
426}
427
428#ifndef HB_NO_OT_FONT_GLYPH_NAMES
429static hb_bool_t
430hb_ot_get_glyph_name (hb_font_t *font HB_UNUSED,
431 void *font_data,
432 hb_codepoint_t glyph,
433 char *name, unsigned int size,
434 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
435{
436 const hb_ot_font_t *ot_font = (const hb_ot_font_t *) font_data;
437 const hb_ot_face_t *ot_face = ot_font->ot_face;
438
439 if (ot_face->post->get_glyph_name (glyph, buf: name, buf_len: size)) return true;
440#ifndef HB_NO_OT_FONT_CFF
441 if (ot_face->cff1->get_glyph_name (glyph, buf: name, buf_len: size)) return true;
442#endif
443 return false;
444}
445static hb_bool_t
446hb_ot_get_glyph_from_name (hb_font_t *font HB_UNUSED,
447 void *font_data,
448 const char *name, int len,
449 hb_codepoint_t *glyph,
450 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
451{
452 const hb_ot_font_t *ot_font = (const hb_ot_font_t *) font_data;
453 const hb_ot_face_t *ot_face = ot_font->ot_face;
454
455 if (ot_face->post->get_glyph_from_name (name, len, glyph)) return true;
456#ifndef HB_NO_OT_FONT_CFF
457 if (ot_face->cff1->get_glyph_from_name (name, len, glyph)) return true;
458#endif
459 return false;
460}
461#endif
462
463static hb_bool_t
464hb_ot_get_font_h_extents (hb_font_t *font,
465 void *font_data HB_UNUSED,
466 hb_font_extents_t *metrics,
467 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
468{
469 bool ret = _hb_ot_metrics_get_position_common (font, metrics_tag: HB_OT_METRICS_TAG_HORIZONTAL_ASCENDER, position: &metrics->ascender) &&
470 _hb_ot_metrics_get_position_common (font, metrics_tag: HB_OT_METRICS_TAG_HORIZONTAL_DESCENDER, position: &metrics->descender) &&
471 _hb_ot_metrics_get_position_common (font, metrics_tag: HB_OT_METRICS_TAG_HORIZONTAL_LINE_GAP, position: &metrics->line_gap);
472
473 /* Embolden */
474 int y_shift = font->y_strength;
475 if (font->y_scale < 0) y_shift = -y_shift;
476 metrics->ascender += y_shift;
477
478 return ret;
479}
480
481#ifndef HB_NO_VERTICAL
482static hb_bool_t
483hb_ot_get_font_v_extents (hb_font_t *font,
484 void *font_data HB_UNUSED,
485 hb_font_extents_t *metrics,
486 void *user_data HB_UNUSED)
487{
488 return _hb_ot_metrics_get_position_common (font, metrics_tag: HB_OT_METRICS_TAG_VERTICAL_ASCENDER, position: &metrics->ascender) &&
489 _hb_ot_metrics_get_position_common (font, metrics_tag: HB_OT_METRICS_TAG_VERTICAL_DESCENDER, position: &metrics->descender) &&
490 _hb_ot_metrics_get_position_common (font, metrics_tag: HB_OT_METRICS_TAG_VERTICAL_LINE_GAP, position: &metrics->line_gap);
491}
492#endif
493
494#ifndef HB_NO_DRAW
495static void
496hb_ot_draw_glyph (hb_font_t *font,
497 void *font_data HB_UNUSED,
498 hb_codepoint_t glyph,
499 hb_draw_funcs_t *draw_funcs, void *draw_data,
500 void *user_data)
501{
502 bool embolden = font->x_strength || font->y_strength;
503 hb_outline_t outline;
504
505 { // Need draw_session to be destructed before emboldening.
506 hb_draw_session_t draw_session (embolden ? hb_outline_recording_pen_get_funcs () : draw_funcs,
507 embolden ? &outline : draw_data, font->slant_xy);
508 if (!font->face->table.glyf->get_path (font, gid: glyph, draw_session))
509#ifndef HB_NO_CFF
510 if (!font->face->table.cff1->get_path (font, glyph, draw_session))
511 if (!font->face->table.cff2->get_path (font, glyph, draw_session))
512#endif
513 {}
514 }
515
516 if (embolden)
517 {
518 float x_shift = font->embolden_in_place ? 0 : (float) font->x_strength / 2;
519 float y_shift = (float) font->y_strength / 2;
520 if (font->x_scale < 0) x_shift = -x_shift;
521 if (font->y_scale < 0) y_shift = -y_shift;
522 outline.embolden (x_strength: font->x_strength, y_strength: font->y_strength,
523 x_shift, y_shift);
524
525 outline.replay (pen: draw_funcs, pen_data: draw_data);
526 }
527}
528#endif
529
530#ifndef HB_NO_PAINT
531static void
532hb_ot_paint_glyph (hb_font_t *font,
533 void *font_data,
534 hb_codepoint_t glyph,
535 hb_paint_funcs_t *paint_funcs, void *paint_data,
536 unsigned int palette,
537 hb_color_t foreground,
538 void *user_data)
539{
540#ifndef HB_NO_COLOR
541 if (font->face->table.COLR->paint_glyph (font, glyph, funcs: paint_funcs, data: paint_data, palette_index: palette, foreground)) return;
542 if (font->face->table.SVG->paint_glyph (font, glyph, funcs: paint_funcs, data: paint_data)) return;
543#ifndef HB_NO_OT_FONT_BITMAP
544 if (font->face->table.CBDT->paint_glyph (font, glyph, funcs: paint_funcs, data: paint_data)) return;
545 if (font->face->table.sbix->paint_glyph (font, glyph, funcs: paint_funcs, data: paint_data)) return;
546#endif
547#endif
548 if (font->face->table.glyf->paint_glyph (font, gid: glyph, funcs: paint_funcs, data: paint_data, foreground)) return;
549#ifndef HB_NO_CFF
550 if (font->face->table.cff1->paint_glyph (font, glyph, funcs: paint_funcs, data: paint_data, foreground)) return;
551 if (font->face->table.cff2->paint_glyph (font, glyph, funcs: paint_funcs, data: paint_data, foreground)) return;
552#endif
553}
554#endif
555
556static inline void free_static_ot_funcs ();
557
558static struct hb_ot_font_funcs_lazy_loader_t : hb_font_funcs_lazy_loader_t<hb_ot_font_funcs_lazy_loader_t>
559{
560 static hb_font_funcs_t *create ()
561 {
562 hb_font_funcs_t *funcs = hb_font_funcs_create ();
563
564 hb_font_funcs_set_nominal_glyph_func (ffuncs: funcs, func: hb_ot_get_nominal_glyph, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
565 hb_font_funcs_set_nominal_glyphs_func (ffuncs: funcs, func: hb_ot_get_nominal_glyphs, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
566 hb_font_funcs_set_variation_glyph_func (ffuncs: funcs, func: hb_ot_get_variation_glyph, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
567

569 hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_h_advances_func (ffuncs: funcs, func: hb_ot_get_glyph_h_advances, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
570 //hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_h_origin_func (funcs, hb_ot_get_glyph_h_origin, nullptr, nullptr);
571
572#ifndef HB_NO_VERTICAL
573 hb_font_funcs_set_font_v_extents_func (ffuncs: funcs, func: hb_ot_get_font_v_extents, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
574 hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_v_advances_func (ffuncs: funcs, func: hb_ot_get_glyph_v_advances, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
575 hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_v_origin_func (ffuncs: funcs, func: hb_ot_get_glyph_v_origin, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
576#endif

579 hb_font_funcs_set_draw_glyph_func (ffuncs: funcs, func: hb_ot_draw_glyph, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
580#endif

582#ifndef HB_NO_PAINT
583 hb_font_funcs_set_paint_glyph_func (ffuncs: funcs, func: hb_ot_paint_glyph, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
584#endif
585
586 hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_extents_func (ffuncs: funcs, func: hb_ot_get_glyph_extents, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
587 //hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_contour_point_func (funcs, hb_ot_get_glyph_contour_point, nullptr, nullptr);
588
589#ifndef HB_NO_OT_FONT_GLYPH_NAMES
590 hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_name_func (ffuncs: funcs, func: hb_ot_get_glyph_name, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
591 hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_from_name_func (ffuncs: funcs, func: hb_ot_get_glyph_from_name, user_data: nullptr, destroy: nullptr);
592#endif
593
594 hb_font_funcs_make_immutable (ffuncs: funcs);
595
596 hb_atexit (func: free_static_ot_funcs);
597
598 return funcs;
599 }
600} static_ot_funcs;
601
602static inline
603void free_static_ot_funcs ()
604{
605 static_ot_funcs.free_instance ();
606}
607
608static hb_font_funcs_t *
609_hb_ot_get_font_funcs ()
610{
611 return static_ot_funcs.get_unconst ();
612}
613
614
615/**
616 * hb_ot_font_set_funcs:
617 * @font: #hb_font_t to work upon
618 *
619 * Sets the font functions to use when working with @font.
620 *
621 * Since: 0.9.28
622 **/
623void
624hb_ot_font_set_funcs (hb_font_t *font)
625{
626 hb_ot_font_t *ot_font = _hb_ot_font_create (font);
627 if (unlikely (!ot_font))
628 return;
629
630 hb_font_set_funcs (font,
631 klass: _hb_ot_get_font_funcs (),
632 font_data: ot_font,
633 destroy: _hb_ot_font_destroy);
634}
635
636#ifndef HB_NO_VAR
637bool
638_glyf_get_leading_bearing_with_var_unscaled (hb_font_t *font, hb_codepoint_t glyph, bool is_vertical,
639 int *lsb)
640{
641 return font->face->table.glyf->get_leading_bearing_with_var_unscaled (font, gid: glyph, is_vertical, lsb);
642}
643
644unsigned
645_glyf_get_advance_with_var_unscaled (hb_font_t *font, hb_codepoint_t glyph, bool is_vertical)
646{
647 return font->face->table.glyf->get_advance_with_var_unscaled (font, gid: glyph, is_vertical);
648}
649#endif

651
652#endif
